title: Chapter 1130 - The Laws Of The Stolen Heavens
volume_title: Sword In Hand, He Stands Above The Wilds, Sovereign Throughout The Ages
body:
Chapter 1130 - The Laws Of The Stolen Heavens

The distant Tailor swayed slightly on his feet, and his pupils constricted. 

A moment later, he sighed. “Impressive, Su Xuanjun. You blocked my Eye of the Nightmare Thief with your paltry Profound Serenity Realm cultivation. Yes, truly impressive!”

But then, he sharply changed tacks, and a furtive look appeared on his thoroughly wrinkled face. “I just don’t know if you’ve awakened the memories of your past life yet?”

His words left every heart quivering with fright.

There was no doubt that the Tailor, one of the most dangerous powerhouses of the starry skies, had attacked the Swordmaster of Abstruse Force, to no avail!

But what really left the onlookers bewildered was that last question. What does he mean, the memories of his past life?

Before Su Yi could answer, Qing Tang’s beautiful face frosted over. “You’re seeking death, you old tortoise!”

Whoosh!

She disappeared into thin air, then reappeared in front of the Tailor. Her snowy right hand clenched into a fist and slammed down like the edge of a sword.

The entire stretch of heaven and earth collapsed, and the surrounding space exploded into bits.

It was just one punch, but its power seemed to bore a hole through the entire...
original_title: Chapter 1130 - The Laws of the Stolen Heavens
